project1.description: A photography website showcasing various categories including nature, children, travel, equipment, culture and sports photography.

project2.description: A modern and responsive personal portfolio website built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS, featuring animated UI components, project showcases, skills visualization, and contact features. Designed with accessibility and performance in mind.

project3.description: A simple and intuitive task list application that helps you organize and track your daily activities.

project4.description: An e-commerce website dedicated to selling fashionable clothing for women, men and children with a varied collection of styles and sizes.

project5.description: A cutting-edge medical facility website showcasing comprehensive health services, professional medical team, and patient-centered care. Features include appointment booking, service information, and health resources.

contact.title: Contact Me
contact.description: Do you have a project in mind? A question? Don't hesitate to contact me. I would be delighted to discuss your ideas and see how we can collaborate.
